actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to permit donations of surplus property to volunteer firefighting organizations and volunteer rescue squads, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Permits donations of surplus property pursuant to the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act to volunteer firefighting organizations and volunteer rescue squads. (Amends 40 U.S.C. 484(j))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to permit donations of surplus property to volunteer firefighting organizations and volunteer rescue squads, and for other purposes.
